page.title: 13The Arts in Pontefract.
page.content: Pontefract can supply a large variety of Clubs and Societies which range from the traditional Rotary Clubs to the Hi-Tec computer and photographic societies.The town's theatrical needs are amply provided for by the St.Giles with St.Mary's Pantomime/Theatrical Society.Pontefract is the venue for an annual music festival which is held in the Town Hall every May.The schools in the area compete in many different classes ranging from solos to wind groups.The local library provides an excellent service and also acts as an Art Gallery in which local schools and societies can set up displays.The Museum set up in the last decade already has a fine collection of historical artifacts and acts as a host to exhibits of more recent times such as holographic projections.
